effect.gold_silver: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.crystal: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.gold_silver: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.crystal: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

flavor_text.gold_silver: Whips up a strong gust of wind.
flavor_text.crystal: Whips up a strong gust of wind.
